text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in ConceptMapRelationship
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/tools/CodeSystem/r4-equivalence

name: SelectByMapFilterCodesVS
title: SelectByMap Filter Codes (VS)
description: select-by-map filter Codes - from either R4 (or previous) or R5
